include/machine/key.h

00001 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*
00002  * Operating Systems I                                                       *
00003  *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*
00004  *                                                                           *
00005  *                                K E Y                                      *
00006  *                                                                           *
00007  *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00008 
00009 #ifndef __Key_include__
00010 #define __Key_include__
00011 
00016 class Key {
00017   unsigned char asc;
00018   unsigned char scan;
00019   unsigned char modi;
00020 
00022   struct mbit {
00023         enum {
00024       shift      = 1,
00025            alt_left    = 2,
00026            alt_right   = 4,
00027            ctrl_left   = 8,
00028            ctrl_right  = 16,
00029            caps_lock   = 32,
00030            num_lock    = 64,
00031            scroll_lock = 128
00032         };
00033   };
00034 
00035 public:
00040   Key () : asc (0), scan (0), modi (0) {}
00041 
00047   bool valid ()      { return scan != 0; }
00048 
00052   void invalidate () { scan = 0; }
00053 
00054   // ASCII, SCANCODE: getter and setter methods for ASCII und Scancode
00055   void ascii (unsigned char a) { asc = a; }
00056   void scancode (unsigned char s) { scan = s; }
00057   unsigned char ascii () { return asc; }
00058   unsigned char scancode () { return scan; }
00059 
00060   // methods to set and erase the keys: SHIFT, ALT, CTRL, ...
00061   void shift (bool pressed)
00062     { modi = pressed ? modi | mbit::shift : modi & ~mbit::shift; }
00063   void alt_left (bool pressed)
00064     { modi = pressed ? modi | mbit::alt_left : modi & ~mbit::alt_left; }
00065   void alt_right (bool pressed)
00066     { modi = pressed ? modi | mbit::alt_right : modi & ~mbit::alt_right; }
00067   void ctrl_left (bool pressed)
00068     { modi = pressed ? modi | mbit::ctrl_left : modi & ~mbit::ctrl_left; }
00069   void ctrl_right (bool pressed)
00070     { modi = pressed ? modi | mbit::ctrl_right : modi & ~mbit::ctrl_right; }
00071   void caps_lock (bool pressed)
00072     { modi = pressed ? modi | mbit::caps_lock : modi & ~mbit::caps_lock; }
00073   void num_lock (bool pressed)
00074     { modi = pressed ? modi | mbit::num_lock : modi & ~mbit::num_lock; }
00075   void scroll_lock (bool pressed)
00076     { modi = pressed ? modi | mbit::scroll_lock : modi & ~mbit::scroll_lock; }
00077 
00078   // methods to get the information of the keys: SHIFT, ALT, CTRL, ...
00079   bool shift ()       { return modi & mbit::shift; }
00080   bool alt_left ()    { return modi & mbit::alt_left; }
00081   bool alt_right ()   { return modi & mbit::alt_right; }
00082   bool ctrl_left ()   { return modi & mbit::ctrl_left; }
00083   bool ctrl_right ()  { return modi & mbit::ctrl_right; }
00084   bool caps_lock ()   { return modi & mbit::caps_lock; }
00085   bool num_lock ()    { return modi & mbit::num_lock; }
00086   bool scroll_lock () { return modi & mbit::scroll_lock; }
00087   bool alt ()         { return alt_left ()  | alt_right (); }
00088   bool ctrl ()        { return ctrl_left () | ctrl_right (); }
00089 
00090   operator char ()    { return (char) asc; }
00091 
00092   // Scancodes for specific keys
00093   struct scan { 
00094         enum {
00095       f1 = 0x3d, del = 0x53, up=72, down=80, left=75, right=77,
00096       div = 8
00097         };
00098   };
00099 };
00100 
00101 #endif
